name: 90160 Electronic Brake Control Proportional Trailer Brake Controller (LED Display, self-Diagnostic Function) Fit for Ford, GM, Chevy, Dodge, RAM, Toyota, Jeep
short_description: ⌛【Advanced Technology】90160 brake controller features advanced proportional braking technology, automatically adjusting trailer brake force based on vehicle braking intensity. Whether towing light utility trailers or heavy commercial trailers, it ensures smooth and stable braking performance, delivering safe and worry-free stops every time.

⌛【Real-time monitoring】Equipped with a high-contrast digital screen, it provides real-time visibility of trailer brake settings and connection status. The continuous self-diagnostic function instantly detects anomalies and alerts users via the display, enabling quick troubleshooting to prevent potential issues.
⌛【Easy installation】Features a snap-on quick-release bracket and a traditional screw-in bracket, allowing horizontal or vertical rotation (freely adjustable within 180°) to fit any cockpit position.
⌛【Manual Slider Control】Instantly adjust braking force with the manual slider for quick response to unexpected situations.
⌛【Warm Tips】You have purchased this product from our shop. We provide 2 years warranty.Please ensure that the size of your product is the same before making a purchase.

name: Tekonsha 90160 Primus IQ, Proportional Brake Controller for Trailers with 1-3 Axles, compatible with Ford, GM, Chevy, Dodge, RAM, Toyota, Jeep. Wiring Harness Sold Separately.
short_description: PROPORTIONAL ELECTRIC BRAKE CONTROLLER: Provides automatic braking based on the intensity and rate at which you apply your tow vehicle’s brakes, giving you smooth braking thanks to an internal inertia sensor. This makes the Primus IQ brake controller ideal for general and heavy-duty emergency braking.

EASILY INSTALL AND STOW, THANKS TO PLUG & PLAY: The Primus IQ trailer brake controller has a snap-in dash mounting clip, Plug & Play port for two plug adapters, and removeable electrical connector so the unit can be easily unplugged, unclipped, and stored.
EASY-TO-READ LED DISPLAY: Digital LED display shows settings, real-time diagnostics, and alerts.

BOOST FEATURE PROVIDES EXTRA BRAKING POWER: Boost provides up to three levels of additional stopping power at the touch of a button, giving you confidence in stopping safely when you’re hauling heavier loads and/or need more power to stop.
VERSATILE: The Primus IQ electric brake controller is compatible with a wide range of vehicles including Ford, GM, Chevy, Dodge, RAM, Toyota, Jeep, and more with 2, 4, or 6
product_description: The Tekonsha Primus IQ Proportional Electric Trailer Brake Controller gives you dependable braking power in a compact design. As an industry staple for more than ten years, this electronic brake controller kit provides a smooth braking response in any stopping situation. With its petite yet durable exterior, this electric brake controller fits nicely under the dash, making it easily accessible from the driver’s seat without being in the way. This insightful digital trailer brake controller has an easy-to-read LED display, self-diagnostic check to monitor your connection and trailer braking activity and is self-leveling when mounted within a 90-degree vertical range, so there’s no need to adjust the unit once it’s installed. The electric trailer brake controller also features a power output knob to set your desired braking power, a boost option that lets you apply up quickly and easily to three levels of additional trailer braking power, especially when hauling heavier loads, and manual override. The Primus IQ electric brake controller for trailer was created to work with electric braking systems, works proportionally in reverse to make backing into tough spots a bit easier, and - like the Prodigy P3, Prodigy P2, and many other Tekonsha brake controllers, utilizes primary sensor technology to ensure the smoothest stop possible. When you’re done towing, the IQ’s snap-in dash mounting clip, Plug & Play port for two plug adapters, and removeable electrical connector allow the unit to be quickly stored. The Primus IQ brake controller works with trailers with 1-3 axles, comes with all necessary mounting hardware, and is backed by a limited lifetime warranty.

name: Tekonsha 90195 Prodigy P3 Proportional Brake Controller for Trailers with 1-4 Axles, Compatible with Ford, GM, Chevy, Dodge, RAM, Toyota, Jeep. Wiring harness sold separately.
short_description: VERSATILE: Compatible with a wide range of vehicles including Ford, GM, Chevy, Dodge, RAM, Toyota, Jeep, and more with 2, 4, 6, and 8 brakes (1-4 axles). Tekonsha Plug & Play brake controller wiring harness sold separately.
PROPORTIONAL ELECTRIC BRAKE CONTROLLER: Provides automatic braking based on the intensity and rate at which you apply your tow vehicle’s brakes, thanks to an internal inertia sensor.
EASY-TO-READ LCD DISPLAY: Front-facing color LCD display shows settings, real-time diagnostics, and alerts

STORE SETTING OPTIONS: The Prodigy P3 trailer brake controller can store up to five different trailer or driver preferences, making it the ideal choice for those who use the same tow vehicle to pull multiple trailers.

BOOST FEATURE PROVIDES EXTRA BRAKING POWER: Boost provides up to three levels of additional stopping power at the touch of a button, giving you confidence in stopping safely when you’re hauling heavier loads and/or need more power to stop.

MANUAL BRAKING AVAILABLE: If you ever need to manually apply the brakes, simply move the manual control lever to the left. The Prodigy P3 will apply power to your trailer’s brakes up to the amount of power previously set.
product_description: 5 storable setting options with preferences of multiple drivers, and for pulling different trailers up to 4 axles. A flashing red warning system alerts user to No Trailer Brake situations.

name: Hopkins 47235 Impulse Plug-in Simple Brake Control, Mounts At Any Angle, Controls Up To 6 Trailer Brakes
short_description: TIME-BASED BRAKING: The 47235 brake controller uses time-based actuation to deliver smooth, gradual braking force to your trailer.
PRECISE BRAKING POWER: Easily adjust braking force from 5% to 99%, with a digital display showing exact percentage for optimal control.
EASY INSTALLATION: Features "Plug-In Simple!" wiring and mounts at any angle for fast, flexible setup in most vehicles.
DURABLE & SAFE: Short circuit protected and capable of controlling up to 6 trailer brakes for heavy-duty towing.
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Intuitive vertical manual slide and a built-in digital screen for quick adjustments and visibility.
product_description: The 47235 brake control utilizes time based actuation for applying braking power to the trailer brakes. The built-in digital display makes it easy for setting braking intensity. The braking force to the trailer can easily be adjusted from 5% to 99% for setting the exact percentage of brake power desired. Most states and provinces require a trailer brake controller based on the weight of the trailer.
